Gravity: The block A is falling freely from above. Gravity will cause it to accelerate downward at a constant rate.
Collision: The block A will collide with the blue block in the middle of the orange blocks.
Deflection: The blue block will deflect the path of the block A, causing it to land on the green block.
Initial Position: The block A is falling from above, and it is positioned above the block group.
